languages.text: "Чем вы руководствовались, когда позволили {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносам{/g}, врагам Человечества, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}жить{/d} и действовать на принадлежащей вам планете?"

traits.locale_text: "Есть сведения, что вы вступили в контакт с представителями ксенорасы, и даже обеспечили некий режим потворства им на планете. Звучит опасно, не находите?"

languages.text: "What was the reasoning behind your decision to let {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemies of Humanity, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}live{/d} and act on a planet that belongs to you?"
languages.original_text: "Чем вы руководствовались, когда позволили {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносам{/g}, врагам Человечества, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}жить{/d} и действовать на принадлежащей вам планете?"

traits.locale_text: "What was the reasoning behind your decision to let xenos, enemies of Humanity, live and act on a planet that belongs to you?"
"What was the reasoning behind your decision to let xenos, enemies of Humanity, live and act on a planet that belongs to you?"
"What was the reasoning behind your decision to let {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemies of Humanity, live and act on a planet that belongs to you?"
"What was the reasoning behind your decision to let {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemies of Humanity, live and act on a planet that belongs to you?"
"What was the reasoning behind your decision to let {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemies of Humanity, live and act on a planet that belongs to you?"

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の扱いを決めた根拠は何だ？奴らは人類の敵、それがお前の星で{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}生きて{/d}活動しているとは」
languages.original_text: "What was the reasoning behind your decision to let {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemies of Humanity, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}live{/d} and act on a planet that belongs to you?"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の扱いを決めた根拠は何だ？奴らは人類の敵、それがお前の星で{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}生きて{/d}活動しているとは」

languages.original_text: "What was the reasoning behind your decision to let xenos, enemies of Humanity, live and act on a planet that belongs to you?"

languages.text: “你为什么会允许人类之敌，{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，在你掌管的行星上自由{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}生活{/d}？”
languages.original_text: "What was the reasoning behind your decision to let {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemies of Humanity, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}live{/d} and act on a planet that belongs to you?"

traits.locale_text: “你为什么会允许人类之敌，{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，在你掌管的行星上自由生活？”

languages.text: «¿Qué razón motivó su decisión de dejar que los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemigos de la Humanidad, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}vivan{/d} y actúen en un planeta que le pertenece?».
languages.original_text: "What was the reasoning behind your decision to let {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemies of Humanity, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}live{/d} and act on a planet that belongs to you?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué razón motivó su decisión de dejar que los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemigos de la Humanidad, vivan y actúen en un planeta que le pertenece?».

languages.text: « Pourriez-vous m'expliquer pourquoi vous avez laissé des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, ennemis de l'humanité, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}vivre librement{/d} sur une planète qui vous appartient ? »
languages.original_text: "What was the reasoning behind your decision to let {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemies of Humanity, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}live{/d} and act on a planet that belongs to you?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourriez-vous m'expliquer pourquoi vous avez laissé des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, ennemis de l'humanité, vivre librement sur une planète qui vous appartient ? »

languages.text: "Was war der Grund für Eure Entscheidung, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, also Feinde der Menschheit, auf einem Planeten {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}leben{/d} und wirken zu lassen, der Euch gehört?"
languages.original_text: "What was the reasoning behind your decision to let {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemies of Humanity, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}live{/d} and act on a planet that belongs to you?"

traits.locale_text: "Was war der Grund für Eure Entscheidung, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, also Feinde der Menschheit, auf einem Planeten leben und wirken zu lassen, der Euch gehört?"

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenoların{/g}, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının sana ait bir gezegende {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}yaşamasına{/d} ve faaliyetlerde bulunmasına müsaade etme kararına etki eden şey neydi?"
languages.original_text: "What was the reasoning behind your decision to let {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, enemies of Humanity, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarAllies}live{/d} and act on a planet that belongs to you?"

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g}ların, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının sana ait bir gezegende yaşamasına ve faaliyetlerde bulunmasına müsaade etme kararına etki eden şey neydi?
